title: King

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Condemn two players.
-You may prosecute the night after a player who you condemn is lynched.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid the town of heretics and nonbelievers.

desc:
Post 3247
*You are the leader of the land and are unafraid to prosecute nonbelievers*
